administrative subdivision (e.g. of provinces into counties)

sentences.english: Article 3 The Macao Special Administrative Region shall be vested with independent judicial power, including that of final adjudication.
sentences.chinese: 第三條澳門特別行政區享有獨立的司法權和終審權。

sentences.english: The bauhinia flower is the emblem of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次看見紫荊花是在香港特別行政區的區徽上。

sentences.english: Located in the west of the planned area, adjacent to the tourism zone and the downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 位於規劃區西部，毗鄰旅遊經濟區和中心行政區。

sentences.english: It is very necessary to structure city groups based on province-level administrative regions in our country.
sentences.chinese: 基於省級行政區域構建城市羣在我國很有必要。

sentences.english: Hence, special administrative regions enjoy independent penal jurisdiction of their own.
sentences.chinese: 因此，特別行政區有了獨立的刑事管轄權。

sentences.english: These Procedures are applicable to the lease of state-owned land within the administrative areas of this Municipality.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法適用於本市行政區域內的國有土地租賃活動。

sentences.english: The regional flag of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is a red flag with a bauhinia highlighted by five star-tipped stamens.
sentences.chinese: 香港特別行政區的區旗是五星花蕊的紫荊花紅旗。

sentences.english: The Labour Department administers labour laws in force in the HKSAR.
sentences.chinese: 勞工處負責執行香港特別行政區的勞工法例。

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War early, Linfen in Shanxi Province for seven administrative districts in the 6th District.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭初期，臨汾爲山西省7個行政區中的第6區。

sentences.english: Regional legislation shall apply to administrative cases arising in the region concerned.
sentences.chinese: 地方性法規適用於本行政區域內發生的行政案件。

sentences.english: In 1999, Macao was reintegrated into China as an autonomous region with special status.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，澳門作爲特別行政區重回中國管轄。

sentences.english: This paper analyses all kinds of possible situations of boundary for the reason of administrative division readjustment.
sentences.chinese: 分析了行政區劃調整可能引起邊界線變化的各種情況。

sentences.english: Local people's governments at various levels shall place under their protection cultural relics in their respective administrative areas.
sentences.chinese: 地方各級人民政府保護本行政區域內的文物。

sentences.english: Application Form for Post-Secondary Student Summer Internship Programme in the Government …
sentences.chinese: 香港特別行政區政府專上學生暑期實習計劃申請書。

sentences.english: Administrative border is one of the most important constituent parts of the national basic geography information.
sentences.chinese: 行政區域界線是國家基礎地理信息的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The bauhinia flower is the emblem of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.
sentences.chinese: 香港特別行政區的區徽是紫荊花。

definition: municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
(military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)

special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong 香港 and Macau 澳門|澳门/refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government/refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
autonomous region, namely: Inner Mongolia 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区, Guangxi 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区, Tibet 西藏自治區|西藏自治区, Ningxia 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区, Xinjiang 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区
